original_text: the two pillars, the two bowls of the capitals that were on the tops of the pillars, and the two latticeworks to cover the two bowls of the capitals that were on the tops of the pillars;
korean_text: 곧 기둥 둘과 그 기둥 꼭대기의 공 같은 머리 둘과 또 기둥 꼭대기의 공 같은 머리를 가리는 그물 둘과

sentences.original_text: the two bowls of the capitals
that were on the tops of the pillars
to cover the two bowls of the capitals
sentences.korean_translation: 두 기둥 머리의 두 대야를 덮기 위한

sentences.original_text: that were on the tops of the pillars
